resources.string:
Vista is IIM Bangalore’s annual business summit – a congregation of the smartest minds in the country from both the academic and corporate communities.

Vista also plays host to industry veterans and pioneers to create the perfect environment to drive innovation, change and growth.

Vista anchors a wide range of events and activities that belong to almost all the focus areas imaginable within the domain of business and management.
